name: cs290_finalproject

scripts.build: handlebars views/partials/pictureFrame.handlebars -f scripts/pictureFrame.js && handlebars templates/books.handlebars -f compiled/books.js
scripts.start-OSUServer: handlebars views/partials/pictureFrame.handlebars -f scripts/pictureFrame.js && handlebars templates/books.handlebars -f compiled/books.js && node osu_network_server.js

author: Hunter Lannon, Jeremy Lilly, Chase Stubblefield, Khoa Tran
